snippet.title: Perfect Tides: Station to Station - Official Trailer | Ghouls 4 Games Showcase 2024
snippet.description: Explore the next chapter of Mara Whitefish’s life in Perfect Tides: Station to Station. Check out the new Perfect Tides: Station to Station trailer for this coming of age point n' click narrative adventure sequel. In Perfect Tides: Station to Station, it's 2003 at the dawn of the 21st century, and 18-year-old Mara has left her small island hometown to pursue college as an aspiring writer in the big city. Navigate the next year of her life through four seasonal acts and more than 60 distinct environments to discover. Perfect Tides: Station to Station will be available on PC and Mac via Steam in 2025.
